entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
